title: [突發]中共監控機構進駐香港，將透過港交所獲得資金

replies.msg:
中共監控機構正式進駐香港，將透過港交所獲得資金

中共監控機構上市了

繼小米(01810.HK)及美團(03690.HK)後，研發臉部辨識系統「Face++」的內地AI初創企業曠視科技，已向港交所(00388.HK)遞交上市申請，將採用同股不同權架構上市，有望成為第三間在港上市的W股，市傳集資額最多約10億美元(約78億元)。

http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/news/aafn-con/now.961077/popular-news



中共用的監控機構竟然係香港上市!! 根本中共係指定監控機構!
新疆已經用緊佢地既技術!! 絕對絕對絕對唔可以比佢係香港Cap水，Cap完香港人錢，再監控返香港人!!

阻止佢既方法只有不停寫信比港交所同證監!!

證監:
電郵至complaint@sfc.hk；或
致電2231 1222（選取所需語言後按5字）

港交所:
info@hkex.com.hk

快d行動：一人一信阻上佢上市!

主要投訴內容:
1. 業務不適合上市: 年年都輸錢，單係2019年6月已經錄得虧損 5,200,183,000
2. 法規問題: 嚴重侵犯人權，犯左私隱條例
3. 市值唔夠, 年年都虧損，今年更加虧損 5,200,183,000，根本唔值錢，學咩人湊78億

replies.msg: 投訴就會照做但成效真係...對港交冇期望
IPO 上市前underwriter要揾第三方顧問公司做兩次due diligence 去check 所有supplier,director and senior management。如果太多adverse media或PEP會有機會唔批。所以愈多關於公司的不利訊息(係Google Yahoo baidu factiva nexislexis 搵到) 就愈難過到 SFC.

小弟不才，用d好差既英文寫左 template
歡迎手足改改，或者直接羅去用
多謝你地，跪求大家send 出去:

證監:
電郵至complaint@sfc.hk；或
致電2231 1222（選取所需語言後按5字）

港交所:
info@hkex.com.hk
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dear Sir/ Madams,

I would like to file a formal complaint in relation to the proposed listing of Megvii Technology Limited (“Megvii”).

According to the Application Proof submitted by Megvii Technology Limited on 25 August 2019, I would like to express my grief concern on Megvii’s suitability of Listing in following matters:

1. Profitability and Going concern:

Referencing to the Application Proof of Megvii, it recorded over its all track record period. Megvii recorded loss for the year amounted to approximately RMB 342 million for FY2016 and such loss has accelerated to approximately RMB 5.2billion for the sixth month ended 30 June 2019. If such loss trend maintains in the FY2019, the loss could be further increased to RMB 10 billion for FY2019. There is also no any sign that Megvii could make a turnaround performance after listing base on its historical record. With its current equity amounted to approximately 10 billion for FY2019, Megvii may run out of capital and all existing resources within 1-2 years.

2. Legal compliance : Potential violations of human rights, privacy ordinance and potential crime against humanity

The technology of Megvii has been widely adopted in Xinjiang “Re-education Camp(“the Camp”)” to monitor minority in PRC.

On 24 October 2018, the BBC released the details of an extensive investigation into China's hidden concentration camps and the extent to which the People's Republic goes to maintain what it calls "correct thought". US-based journals like the Foreign Policy Journal and Center for World Indigenous Studies have labeled these policies as "cultural genocide". Some parties refer to these camps as "concentration camps". The Times of Israel wrote a piece comparing these vocational camps to the U.S. Japanese-American concentration camps during World War II as well as the British Palestine internment camps for Jews. The European Union and Turkey were invited to visit part of Xinjiang by China in order to examine the situation themselves. The EU initially declined, due to worries that the tour might be “choreographed” by the Chinese government, but it was open to visit Xinjiang at a later date.

There are also many media performed investigation on the Camp, and suspect that the Camp has committed potential crime against humanity:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swCf6Z5REwI
https://www.bbc.com/news/blogs-china-blog-48700786

The legitimacy of the AI technology of Megvii remains questionable, approval of the listing may give a sign to public, HKEx and SFC agree the above act in the Camp. As a regulatory of the international financial, I sincerely urge you could reject such listing application. Please do not be the evil.

Lastly, I am hereby begging you could reject the listing application. From a Humanity perspective and consider your identity as a Hong Konger, when you make the listing decision of Megvii: think about our teenagers. They are sacrificing their future, life and everything to defend for us; think about the blinded female teens; think about our 6 suicided friends make a death accusation against HK government.

P.S. 香港人加油，不要與狼共舞。

Warm regards,
A humble Hong Kong Citizen

中共監控機構正式進駐香港，將透過港交所獲得資金

中共監控機構上市了

繼小米(01810.HK)及美團(03690.HK)後，研發臉部辨識系統「Face++」的內地AI初創企業曠視科技，已向港交所(00388.HK)遞交上市申請，將採用同股不同權架構上市，有望成為第三間在港上市的W股，市傳集資額最多約10億美元(約78億元)。

http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/news/aafn-con/now.961077/popular-news
